title: GT 4.0: WS MDS Aggregator Framework Command Reference

refnamediv.refpurpose: Registering grid resources to MDS services such as the index and trigger services

refsect1.title: Tool description
refsect1.para: mds-servicegroup-add creates a set of registrations to a WS-ServiceGroup and periodically renews those registrations. It is intended primarily for registering grid resources to MDS services such as the index and trigger services. [todo: where do aggregator sources fit into this definition?]
Registrations are defined in an XML configuration file, which is documented in [add new links].

refsect1.title: Command syntax
refsect1.para: The basic syntax for mds-servicegroup-add is: mds-servicegroup-add -s http://foo [options] config.xml where:

row.entry: This dummy option is required but ignored. All end point references used by mds-servicegroup-add are read from the configuration file, not the command line.

entry.para: By default, mds-servicegroup-add will attempt to make an authenticated connection to each service group. This option is used to specify anonymous connections (and to prevent mds-servicegroup-add from failing if you don't have a valid Grid credential).
Path to the registration configuration file.

refsect1.para: The other standard toolkit options [TODO -- link to standard options page] are also supported.

refsect1.title: Limitations
refsect1.para: It is necessary for the tool to continue to run in order for the registrations that it maintains to be kept alive, as registrations will otherwise time out.
